code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'../styles/Navbar.scss';import Toggler from'./Toggler';import logo from'../assets/logo.png';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Navbar(_ref){let{language,setLanguage}=_ref;const[isMenuOpen,setIsMenuOpen]=useState(false);const handleMenuClick=()=>{setIsMenuOpen(!isMenuOpen);document.body.classList.toggle('no-scroll',isMenuOpen);};const handleLinkClick=sectionId=>{const section=document.querySelector(sectionId);if(section){section.scrollIntoView({behavior:'smooth'});}setIsMenuOpen(false);document.body.classList.remove('no-scroll');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:isMenuOpen?'navbar-section show':'navbar-section',children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:isMenuOpen?'menu-icon open':'menu-icon',onClick:handleMenuClick,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"bar1"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"bar2"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"bar3"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"navbar-flexbox",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"navbar-logo",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"logo-image",src:logo,alt:"nature sculpt logo"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:isMenuOpen?'navbar-links show':'navbar-links',children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#home",onClick:()=>handleLinkClick('#home'),children:language==='EN'?'HOME':'ACCUEIL'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#services",onClick:()=>handleLinkClick('#services'),children:language==='EN'?'OUR SERVICES':'NOS SERVICES'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#about",onClick:()=>handleLinkClick('#about'),children:language==='EN'?'ABOUT US':'À PROPOS'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#portfolio",onClick:()=>handleLinkClick('#portfolio'),children:language==='EN'?'PORTFOLIO':'PORTFOLIO'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Toggler,{language:language,setLanguage:setLanguage})]})]})]});}export default Navbar;
